name: 90-minutes
description:
90-minutes.org is an online football manager where you can compete with thousands of human players from different countries. You take on the role of coach and manager in your own football club. 

Experience exciting live matches against other teams, train your team, choose the right tactics, manage your finances, negotiate with sponsors, build your stadium, act skillfully on the transfer market and become the champion in your league...

And finally the best, 90-minutes.org is Free-2-Play!
